column1: Table 1: E-cigarette use, by sex and age, England, 2014 to 2023
This worksheet contains three tables presented underneath each other with one blank row in between.
Some cells refer to notes which can be found on the 'Notes' worksheet.
Given the changes to the collection of e-cigarette use in both 2018 and 2020, we have provided the data for 2014 to 2017, 2018 to 2019 and 2020 to 2023 separately.
For further information, please refer to [note 7] and the 'Important_data_changes' worksheet.
Please note, data for 'current e-cigarette users' and 'never vaped' are comparable across the entire time series.
Source: Office for National Statistics – Opinions and Lifestyle Survey
Enquiries about these data can be sent by email to: Health.Data@ons.gov.uk
